# BGProcessingTaskRequest

**Class**

A request to launch your app in the background to execute a processing task that can take minutes to complete.

## Declaration

```swift
class BGProcessingTaskRequest
```

## Initializing a Processing Task Request

- **init(identifier:)**: Return a new processing task request for the specified identifier.

## Setting Task Request Options

- **requiresExternalPower**: A Boolean specifying if the processing task requires a device connected to power.
- **requiresNetworkConnectivity**: A Boolean specifying if the processing task requires network connectivity.

## Task requests

- **BGAppRefreshTaskRequest**: A request to launch your app in the background to execute a short refresh task.
- **BGTaskRequest**: An abstract class for representing task requests.
- **BGHealthResearchTaskRequest**: A request to launch your app in the background to execute processing for a health research study in which a user participates.
- **BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest**: A request for a workload that the system continues processing even if a person backgrounds the app.

## Inherits From

- BGTaskRequest

## Inherited By

- BGHealthResearchTaskRequest

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
